contentList.content: You will learn skills from a mix of Bladesinger, Swashbuckler Rogue and Battle Master Fighter skills.
You will learn skills from a mix of Bladesinger, Swashbuckler Rogue and Battle Master Fighter skills.

Blade cantrips do not stack with Extra Attack.

This spell can be cast while you are Silenced.

The bonus on hit damage starts at 0 and increases by [1] every 5 levels.

Blade cantrips do not stack with Extra Attack.

This spell can be cast while you are Silenced.

The bonus on hit damage starts at 0 and increases by [1] every 5 levels.
Attack the target dealing a bonus [1]. If the attack lands and you remain stationary, you can spread green-flame to burn another nearby creature for [2].

Invoking the Arcane Blade Song. You gain a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> and your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> is increased by [2]m. You also gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> in Acrobatics and a +[1] bonus to Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.

This reaction won't trigger on a Critical Hit.

Cannot be stacked with Green-Flame Blade.

Arcane Bladesinging impeded by a shield. Until the shield is removed, your <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLADESONG">Arcane Blade Song</LSTag> won't grant any benefits or let you generate <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ARCANEBLADESONG_TECHINCAL">Arcane Blade Song Charges</LSTag>.
During Arcane Blade Song you can make a Spell Blade attack that deals an additional [1] damage and possibly knocks the target <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
You can't use this attack if you have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>.
The target must be Large or smaller.
All the time spent practicing with blades, spells and sleight of hand has paid off. You gain an additional bonus and reaction action.

Invoke the Arcane Blade Song. You gain a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> and your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> increases by [2]. You also gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> in Acrobatics and a +[1] bonus to Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Can only use Booming Blade once per action.
Stop your Arcane Blade Song early.

Blade cantrips do not stack with Extra Attack.

This spell can be cast while you are Silenced.

The bonus on hit damage starts at 0 and increases by [1] every 5 levels.
Also works if you have an ally within [1] of the target or there is no one but you and the target within [1] but for both you can't have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>.

You also unlock your Arcane Blade Maneuvers and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Arcane Blade Song_Finisher">Arcane Blade Song Climax</LSTag> and the ability to accumulate <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLADESONG_TECHINCAL">Arcane Blade Song Charges</LSTag> in combat.

Arcane Bladesinging impeded by armour. Until the armour is removed, your <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLADESONG">Arcane Blade Song</LSTag> won't grant any benefits or let you generate <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLADESONG_TECHINCAL">Arcane Blade Song Charges</LSTag>.

This reaction will trigger on a Critical Hit.

Cannot be stacked with Booming Blade.
Attack an enemy moving out of your reach.
Strike the target dealing a bonus [1]. If the attack lands, the target is sheathed in booming energy that deals [2] to them if they willingly move.
Training in Arcane War and Song

Blade cantrips do not stack with Extra Attack.

This spell can be cast while you are Silenced.

The bonus on hit damage starts at 0 and increases by [1] every 5 levels.

Requires the ability to Sneak Attack (Melee).
Strike the target dealing a bonus [1]. If the attack lands, the target is sheathed in booming energy that deals [2] to them if they willingly move.

This reaction will trigger on a Critical Hit.

Cannot be stacked with Green-Flame Blade.
Deal a bonus [1] to the target. If the attack lands and you remain stationary, you can spread green flames to burn another for [2].
You can't use this attack if you have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>.
You can use both your action and bonus action on a turn to attack a target with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> and deal an additional [1] damage.

A charge that will increase how much damage you deal to enemies by [1] when using Arcane Blade Song Climax.

You can accumulate these charges by attacking with weapons.

This reaction won't trigger on a Critical Hit.

Cannot be stacked with Booming Blade.
When you take the Dash Action, your Speed increases by [1] for that action.
This effect still works if your attack misses.
Can only use Green-Flame Blade once per action.
Also works if you have an ally within [1] of the target or there is no one but you and the target within [1] but for both you can't have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>.
Attack the target dealing a bonus [1]. If the attack lands and you remain stationary, you can spread green-flame to burn another nearby creature for [2].
Your hands have become infused with the weave and anticipate your movements. You gain an additional action.

Blade cantrips do not stack with Extra Attack.

This spell can be cast while you are Silenced.

The bonus on hit damage starts at 0 and increases by [1] every 5 levels.
If you move after making a melee attack, you don't provoke <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag> from your target.
During Arcane Blade Song, make an attack that deals an additional [1] damage and possibly forces the target to drop the weapons they are holding.
During Arcane Blade Song, Cleave your weapon in a rapid, sweeping arc to attack multiple enemies at once.
Can burn a nearby enemy with <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_GreenFlameBladeExtra">Spread Green Flame Blade</LSTag>. Removed if you move.
You gain an additional way to use your Sneak Attack; You can now also perform sneak attacks if there are no other enemies within 5 feet of the target (the enemy is isolated).

your confidence propels you into battle. You can give yourself a bonus to your initiative rolls equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>

A charge that will increase how much you heal yourself and your allies by [1] when using Arcane Blade Song Climax.

You can accumulate these charges by attacking with weapons.

Arcane Bladesinging impeded by a weapon. Until the weapon is removed, your <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLADESONG">Arcane Blade Song</LSTag> won't grant any benefits or let you generate <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLADESONG_TECHINCAL">Arcane Blade Song Charges</LSTag>.

Unleash the full damaging and healing effects of your Arcane Blade Song at once. Your <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLADESONG_DAMAGE_CHARGE">Arcane Blade Song Damage Charges</LSTag> will harm enemies an additional [1], and your <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLADESONG_HEALING_CHARGE">Arcane Blade Song Healing Charges</LSTag> will heal you and your allies an additional [2].
Cannot be targeted by <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_GreenFlameBladeExtra">Spread Green Flame Blade</LSTag>.
Strike the target dealing a bonus [1]. If the attack lands, the target is sheathed in booming energy that deals [2] to them if they willingly move.

Arcane Bladesinging impeded due to being unarmed. Until a valid weapon is equipped, your <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLADESONG">Arcane Blade Song</LSTag> won't grant any benefits or let you generate <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLADESONG_TECHINCAL">Arcane Blade Song Charges</LSTag>.
This will end your <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLADESONG">Arcane Blade Song</LSTag>.

You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> with Light Armour and in the Performance skill. You also gain Proficiency with Daggers, Sickles, Shortswords, Rapiers, Scimitars, and Longswords.

During Arcane Blade Song, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DISTRACTED">Distract</LSTag> your target, giving your allies <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on their next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against the target.

Blade cantrips do not stack with Extra Attack.

This spell can be cast while you are Silenced.

The bonus on hit damage starts at 0 and increases by [1] every 5 levels.

Requires the ability to Sneak Attack (Melee).
Also works if you have an ally within [1] of the target or there is no one but you and within [1] of the target. However you can't have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>.
Can only cast Booming Blade or Green-Flame Blade once per action.

<LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against you have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>, and you have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
When a hostile creature misses you with a melee attack, expend a reaction to retaliate with a powerful strike that deals an additional [1] damage.
Parry the next melee attack that hits you to reduce the damage by [1] + <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>.
When hit with a melee attack, the affected entity can use a reaction and reduce the damage by [1].

Focusing on avoiding attacks.

Attack Rolls against the affected entity have Disadvantage, and the entity has Advantage on Dexterity Saving Throws.

When you are about to be hit by an enemy, increase your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> by 5. You take no damage from <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_MagicMissile">Magic Missile</LSTag>.
When a creature misses you with a melee attack, you can retaliate with a powerful strike that deals an additional [1] damage if you are wielding a melee weapon.

Reduce the damage from a ranged weapon attack by 1d10 + your Dexterity Modifier + [1].

If the damage is reduced to 0. This action costs a Reaction Deflect the Missile.
You can only reduce damage from the attack - any additional effects can't be negated.
Arcane Blades are in tune with their bodies allowing them to draw upon magic to increase their physical prowess through practiced rituals.
You learn Arcane Actions <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_ArcaneHide">Arcane Hide</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_ArcaneDash">Arcane Dash</LSTag>.
Hide from enemies by succeeding <LSTag Tooltip="Stealth">Stealth checks</LSTag>. Stick to the dark and avoid enemy sightlines. Attacking or casting a spell will reveal your location.
Cover more distance this turn: double your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag>.
Try to stop a spell being cast.

If it is higher level than [1], you must make a <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">check</LSTag> to prevent it. The check's difficulty is equal to [2] plus the level of the spell you are trying to counter.

Nullify another creature's spell as a reaction. The spell must be 3rd Level or lower. If it is higher than [1] you must succeed a <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Check</LSTag> to nullify it, the difficulty of which is based on the spell's Level.
Stop a spell from being cast. If the spell is higher level than [1], you must roll to prevent it.
As an Arcane blade you were trained in a number of defensive moves.
Swing your weapon in a large arc to attack up to [1] enemies at once.
